Name: The Cooking Game VR
About the game: Enjoy the fun and excitement of preparing fast food dishes, competing with rival chef and serving hungry customers! The game is fully playable in single player and Multiplayer PvP mode! In multiplayer PvP mode, stable internet connection is required. FEATURES - Various fast food items - 30 missions of increasing difficulty - Realistic cooking simulation: add mustard to hotdog by squeezing the bottle; cook burger meat in a frying pan; and operate deep frying machine like a PRO! - Earn stars from completing mission goals - Upgrade kitchen appliances like your own restaurant - Out-serve another player in PvP gameplay Music by Davide Castagno @jobbe314soundesign Available for Arcades on SpringboardVR
